tldr: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to denial of service (DoS) due to a flaw in the `sign` function when using `ed25519` with a key that is not 64 bytes. Supplying such an invalid key triggers a panic, causing the application to crash and become unavailable.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a vulnerable version of the package.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `github.com/yaronf/httpsign` library to the patch version.
